_xResult.title: Ivory Tower Wrap Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made white midi with nautical themes
_xResult.longdesc:
It's pretty hard not to hang out in your ivory tower when you look this spectacular. But you've got to come down and share your beauty with the rest of us because it's just too much to hide!

 

This custom made overlap dress is made out of a viscose crepe with a soft, blue silk tie. It gives off summery, on-the-boat vibes and we can't get enough of how comfortable it is on top of it all. 

 

Customizations can be done below on the neckline, sleeve length, and dress length. And you can always specify exactly how many inches or centimeters long you'd like your dress to be during the checkout process!
